title: Unai Emery - Wikipedia
snippet: There, he won a Ligue 1 title, two Coupe de France titles, two Coupe de la Ligues, and two Trophée des Champions, including a domestic quadruple in his second season. After the expiry of his contract, Emery was appointed as head coach of English club Arsenal in 2018, succeeding Arsène Wenger.

title: Unai Emery Manager Profile, Record & Stats | Premier League
snippet: More trophies followed during his two years in France with Paris Saint-Germain, including Ligue 1 in 2017/18. Emery took charge of Arsenal in 2018, with Arsene Wenger departing following 22 years in the dugout.

title: Welcome Unai | News | Arsenal.com
snippet: Unai, 46, previously spent three seasons with Sevilla, leading them to an unprecedented three consecutive Europa League titles, establishing the club as a major force in the Spanish league.

title: Unai Emery at Arsenal: a failure or a victim of circumstance? - ESPN
snippet: Unai Emery is enjoying so much ... the departing Wenger, who had fallen from legend to lamented in a tenure spanning almost 22 years....
